descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/26479-1-1363635412.jpg[/img]

[size=3]Are you on the search for a fantastic ENB Mod ? you\'ve come to the right place ! watch the pictures and download my ENB Mod. I wish you much fun with it :)[/size]

[size=6][color=Green]Features[/color][/size] :

[size=5][color=Blue]SSAO[/color][/size]
[size=5][color=Blue]Depth of Field[/color][/size]
[size=5][color=Blue]Lens reflections[/color][/size]
[size=5][color=Blue]Bloom[/color][/size]
[size=5][color=Blue]AMAZING Lighting[/color][/size]
[size=5][color=Blue]Sun rays[/color][/size]
[size=5][color=Blue]COLOURFUL Nights[/color][/size]


[size=6][color=Green]HOW TO INSTALL[/color][/size] :

[size=3]1. Download and extract my mod into your skyrim directory

2. Download \"the latest ENB Series for TES Skyrim\" from [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]Here[/url] and extract \"d3d9.dll\"
from the download to your skyrim directory[/size]


if you have fun with my mod you may also like to click on the endrosementbutton. that would be very nice :)



[size=6][color=Green]Recommended mods[/color][/size] :

[size=5][color=Red]ENB Weather Extended[/color][/size]
[size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20944]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20944[/url][/size]

[size=5][color=Red]Green Water Fix[/color][/size]
[size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14007]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14007[/url][/size]

[size=5][color=Red]Skyrim HD - 2K Textures[/color][/size]
[size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/607]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/607[/url][/size]

[size=5][color=Red]Pure Waters[/color][/size]
[size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1111]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1111[/url][/size]

[size=5][color=Red]A Quality World Map - With Roads[/color][/size]
[size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4929]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4929[/url][/size]

[size=5][color=Red]HiAlgoBoost FPS Performance Accelerator 2[/color][/size]
[size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15123]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15123[/url][/size]
